content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))
- Steam engine is connected to small-electric-pole at position (119.5, -30.5)
- Boiler is connected to pipes at positions (109.5, -31.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5)
- Offshore pump is connected to pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5)

### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of stone-furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) and burner-inserter at position (60.5, -61.5)
- Burner-inserter is connected to stone-furnace

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport-belt at position (63.5, -53.5) and transport-belt at position (64.5, -53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler or steam engine
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel in its inventory before attempting to use it
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it
- Make sure to connect the boiler to the steam engine using pipes

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `small-electric-pole`: 1
  - `pipe`: 20
  - `stone-furnace`: 1
  - `wood`: 7
  - `copper-ore`: 20
  - `iron-plate`: 613
  - `copper-plate`: 5
  - `copper-cable`: 2
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
